verses.verse: Then <S%H559>said<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> unto <S%H4872>me<s%>, Though Moses and <S%H8050>Samuel<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H5315>me<s%>, yet my mind could not be toward this <S%H5971>people<s%>: cast them <S%H7971>out<s%> of my <S%H6440>sight<s%>, and let them go <S%H3318>forth<s%>.

And it shall come to <S%H559>pass<s%>, if they say unto <S%H3318>you<s%>, Where shall we go forth? then you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them<s%>, Thus says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>; Such as are for <S%H4194>death<s%>, to <S%H4194>death<s%>; and such as are for the <S%H2719>sword<s%>, to the <S%H2719>sword<s%>; and such as are for the <S%H7458>famine<s%>, to the <S%H7458>famine<s%>; and such as are for the <S%H7628>captivity<s%>, to the <S%H7628>captivity<s%>.

And I will <S%H6485>appoint<s%> over them <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H4940>kinds<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>: the <S%H2719>sword<s%> to <S%H2026>kill<s%>, and the <S%H3611>dogs<s%> to <S%H5498>tear<s%>, and the <S%H5775>birds<s%> of the <S%H8064>heaven<s%>, and the <S%H929>animals<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, to <S%H398>devour<s%> and <S%H7843>destroy<s%>.

And I will <S%H5414>cause<s%> them to be <S%H2189>removed<s%> into all <S%H4467>kingdoms<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, <S%H1558>because<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3169>Hezekiah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, for that which he <S%H6213>did<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.
For who shall have <S%H2550>pity<s%> upon <S%H3389>you<s%>, O Jerusalem? or who shall <S%H5110>bemoan<s%> <S%H5493>you<s%>? or who shall go aside to <S%H7592>ask<s%> how you <S%H7965>do<s%>?

You have <S%H5203>forsaken<s%> <S%H5002>me<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, you are <S%H3212>gone<s%> <S%H268>backward<s%>: therefore will I stretch <S%H5186>out<s%> my <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H7843>you<s%>, and destroy <S%H3811>you<s%>; I am weary with <S%H5162>repenting<s%>.

And I will <S%H2219>fan<s%> them with a <S%H4214>fan<s%> in the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>; I will <S%H7921>bereave<s%> them of <S%H6>sons<s%>, I will destroy my <S%H5971>people<s%>, since they <S%H7725>return<s%> not from their <S%H1870>ways<s%>.

Their <S%H490>widows<s%> are <S%H6105>increased<s%> to me above the <S%H2344>sand<s%> of the <S%H3220>seas<s%>: I have <S%H935>brought<s%> upon them against the <S%H517>mother<s%> of the young <S%H970>men<s%> a <S%H7703>spoiler<s%> at <S%H6672>noonday<s%>: I have caused him to <S%H5307>fall<s%> upon it <S%H6597>suddenly<s%>, and <S%H928>terrors<s%> upon the <S%H5892>city<s%>.

She that has <S%H3205>borne<s%> <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H535>languishes<s%>: she has given <S%H5301>up<s%> the <S%H5315>Spirit<s%>; her <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H935>gone<s%> down while it was yet <S%H3119>day<s%>: she has been <S%H954>ashamed<s%> and <S%H2659>confounded<s%>: and the <S%H7611>residue<s%> of them will I <S%H5414>deliver<s%> to the <S%H2719>sword<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> their <S%H341>enemies<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.

<S%H188>Woe<s%> is <S%H517>me<s%>, my mother, that you have <S%H3205>borne<s%> me a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H7379>strife<s%> and a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4066>contention<s%> to the whole <S%H776>earth<s%>! I have neither lent on <S%H5383>usury<s%>, nor men have lent to me on <S%H5383>usury<s%>; yet every one of them does curse <S%H7043>me<s%>.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H3808>Truly<s%> it shall be <S%H2896>well<s%> with your <S%H8281>remnant<s%>; <S%H518>truly<s%> I will cause the <S%H341>enemy<s%> to <S%H6293>entreat<s%> you well in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H7451>evil<s%> and in the <S%H6256>time<s%> of <S%H6869>affliction<s%>.
Shall <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H7489>break<s%> the <S%H6828>northern<s%> <S%H1270>iron<s%> and the <S%H5178>steel<s%>?

Your <S%H2428>substance<s%> and your <S%H214>treasures<s%> will I <S%H5414>give<s%> to the <S%H957>plunder<s%> without <S%H4242>price<s%>, and that for all your <S%H2403>sins<s%>, even in all your <S%H1366>borders<s%>.

And I will make you to <S%H5674>pass<s%> with your <S%H341>enemies<s%> into a <S%H776>land<s%> which you <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H784>not<s%>: for a fire is <S%H6919>kindled<s%> in my <S%H639>anger<s%>, which shall burn upon <S%H3344>you<s%>.

O <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, you <S%H3045>know<s%>: <S%H2142>remember<s%> <S%H6485>me<s%>, and visit <S%H5358>me<s%>, and revenge me of my <S%H7291>persecutors<s%>; take me not <S%H3947>away<s%> in your <S%H639>longsuffering<s%>: <S%H3045>know<s%> that for your sake I have <S%H5375>suffered<s%> <S%H2781>rebuke<s%>.

Your <S%H1697>words<s%> were <S%H4672>found<s%>, and I did <S%H398>eat<s%> <S%H1697>them<s%>; and your word was unto me the <S%H8342>joy<s%> and <S%H8057>rejoicing<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%>: for I am <S%H7121>called<s%> by your <S%H8034>name<s%>, O <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%>.

I <S%H3427>sat<s%> not in the <S%H5475>assembly<s%> of the <S%H7832>mockers<s%>, nor <S%H5937>rejoiced<s%>; I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H910>alone<s%> <S%H6440>because<s%> of your <S%H3027>hand<s%>: for you have <S%H4390>filled<s%> me with <S%H2195>indignation<s%>.

Why is my <S%H3511>pain<s%> <S%H5331>perpetual<s%>, and my <S%H4347>wound<s%> <S%H605>incurable<s%>, which <S%H3985>refuses<s%> to be <S%H7495>healed<s%>? will you be altogether unto me as a <S%H391>liar<s%>, and as <S%H4325>waters<s%> that <S%H539>fail<s%>?

Therefore thus <S%H559>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, If you <S%H7725>return<s%>, then will I bring you <S%H7725>again<s%>, and you shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3318>me<s%>: and if you take forth the <S%H3368>precious<s%> from the <S%H2151>vile<s%>, you shall be as my <S%H6310>mouth<s%>: let them <S%H7725>return<s%> unto <S%H7725>you<s%>; but return not you unto them.

And I will <S%H5414>make<s%> you unto this <S%H5971>people<s%> a <S%H1219>fenced<s%> <S%H5178>bronze<s%> <S%H2346>wall<s%>: and they shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H3201>you<s%>, but they shall not prevail against <S%H3467>you<s%>: for I am with you to save you and to <S%H5337>deliver<s%> <S%H5002>you<s%>, says the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>.
And I will <S%H5337>deliver<s%> you out of the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of the <S%H7451>wicked<s%>, and I will <S%H6299>redeem<s%> you out of the <S%H3709>hand<s%> of the <S%H6184>terrible<s%>.
